DOC.brief_title: Endometriosis and Brominated Flame Retardant (ENDOTOX Study)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion for de cases : Age : 1845 years old Deep endometriosis with or without endometriomas that need surgery (clinical examination, MRI, surgery) Accessing to the omental and/or parietal adipose tissue Non opposition of the patients for the samples collection and consent for the present study. Inclusion criterion for the controls : Patients without any history of endometriosis and without suggestive symptomatology. Often patients operated for cesarean section. Possible access to the adipose tissue of the omentum or abdominal wall Exclusion criterion for the cases : Pregnancy Death Exclusion criterion for controls : Pregnancy Death
